Texts.Chs: 确认: 跟随模式解除。单位将保持在原位等待进一步命令。
Texts.Eng: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT: FOLLOW MODE DISENGAGED. UNIT WILL REMAIN IN PLACE AWAITING FURTHER COMMANDS.

Texts.Chs: 确认: 单位准备部署。等待进一步命令。
Texts.Eng: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT: UNIT READY TO DEPLOY. AWAITING FURTHER COMMANDS.

Texts.Chs: 警告: 船用发动机不符合霸权标准。重新校准燃油喷射器。
Texts.Eng: CAUTION: VESSEL ENGINE DOES NOT CONFORM TO HEGEMONY STANDARDS. RECALIBRATING FUEL INJECTORS.

Texts.Chs: 危险: 检测到外来元素。对未知数量加强生物结构。
Texts.Eng: DANGER: FOREIGN ELEMENTS DETECTED. REINFORCING BIOSTRUCTURE AGAINST UNKNOWN QUANTITIES.

Texts.Chs: 错误: 敌我识别系统损坏，请求重启。
Texts.Eng: ERROR: IFF SYSTEMS DAMAGED. REQUESTING REBOOT.

Texts.Chs: 错误: 无法到达目标位置。
Texts.Eng: ERROR: UNABLE TO REACH TARGET LOCATION.

Texts.Chs: 报告: 单位重建成功，准备部署。
Texts.Eng: REPORT: UNIT SUCCESSFULLY RECONSTRUCTED. READY TO DEPLOY.
